PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-05802020-08-23,  ,  ,  IRCC, 
ActDepartment of Citizenship and Immigration Act
Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectInterim Housing Assistance Program - ** Agreement **
PrecisOrder approving that the Minister of Citizenship and Immigration ENTER INTO GRANT AGREEMENTS with any province, for the costs associated with temporary housing for refugee protection claimants under the INTERIM HOUSING ASSISTANCE PROGRAM.
AttachmentsAttachment
